title: Quick Guide for First time users---ETC Toolkits
content:
All the tools require input files in a certain format. The general steps for running each of the tools include:

1. Click on a green Begin ... button on the homepage to start a tool.
2. Read the INPUT REQUIREMENTS for the tool, and go to File Manager to create or upload input files.
3. Follow the instructions (on screen or in Instructions menu) to complete the necessary steps. Your progress is shown on the screen.
4. The final step informs the user the location of output files if any is generated. Take note of the location, then go to File Manager to retrieve or download the output.

title: Quick Guide for First time users---ETC Utilities
content:
Located on the left side corner of the ETC site you will find the Menu button. Click on it and you will be prompted to the dropdown menu, including Utilities and Toolkits. Utilities are explained below:

1. File Manager enables the user to upload and save descriptions and matrices that are part of a project.
2. Task is defined as an activity created by the user that needs to be accomplished by the ETC pipeline. The Task Manager provides a list of the activities, the type of task, date of creation, its status, as well as task-related operations.
3. My Account allows user to change account information, set email notification, and set connection with other resources.
